general.gigTitle: create a website widget with HTML and CSS and use ai for faster development

sellerCard.description:
A professional software engineer with expertise in web development. Also skilled in Python scripting, UI/UX design, and graphic design. The technologies I used the most are HTML, CSS, React, and Nextjs.

I use AI to maximize productivity and enhance my workflow.

description.content:
Hello!


I'm a professional software engineer (specializing in web applications) and I will design a section of your website (widget) using HTML & CSS. The code will match your design as closely as possible and work in most modern web browsers.


Important information:

  • You must have a premade image of your design (JPEG, PSD, etc.) or basic outline. If you don't have a design, you may purchase the gig extra and I will design it.
  • You will need to provide me assets (PNG or SVG format) for icons that are used in the design.
  • I will create the widget using HTML & CSS, then send you the code. This gig is only for the design and doesn't include functionality that requires JavaScript. If you need additional functionality, I'm happy to create a custom offer!
  • You should reach out to me BEFORE purchasing the gig, so that we can determine which gig level is most appropriate for your project.
  • The buyer of this gig will be granted full intellectual property rights at time of delivery. However, I will retain irrevocable, non-exclusive rights to display the work for the purpose of my portfolio.


Thank you for your business!

slide.name: create a website widget with HTML and CSS and use ai for faster development

create a website widget with HTML and CSS and use ai for faster development

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the widget be responsive? (Change size with the page)
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can design it at a fixed size or responsive. It's completely up to you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: \Will you add functionality with Javascript?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. This gig is only for an HTML/CSS design and will not include advanced functionality that requires JavaScript.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I have an idea, but don't have a design yet. Can you design it?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! You may purchase the gig extra and I will create the design. You will just need to tell me what you want, such as "a 3-wide grid of images" or "a contact box."

reviews.comment: Very helpful, I don't know anything about coding, but had a website and an idea and Chris put that idea to reality. He was also very helpful in things non-related, like how to import the tool.
Chris was great.  Quick turnaround and was able to complete the task independently.

Chris was extremely quick, professional, and did an awesome job. We will definitely be using him for more work very soon. Reading through the other reviews, you will find that I'm not the only one that knows Chris does an awesome job!
Awesome delivery! Chris delivered a great widget adjustment very quickly.
